title: [Gyldemar Forest, Ruined Road]
description: The stone retaining walls fan out to open up on a clearing to the southwest.  A pair of broken drake statues lie in ruin at the end of the walls while weeds threaten to engulf them.

The stone retaining walls fan out to open up on a clearing to the southwest.  The nighttime darkness nearly conceals a pair of broken drake statues, which lie in ruin at the end of the walls while weeds threaten to engulf them.
